Granted, you wished it!

i wish for tiMe dilation this tiMe

i wish to be understood

044408192023

Edited August 19, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Granted. Aliens understand you but you don't speak their language.


I wish for kerbals to land on planet Earth.

Granted. They brought the Kraken with them, in all of its forms.

I wish to walk upon the Moon, and gaze upon our beautiful home planet from its desolate lifeless surface.

Granted. You can't return because you messed up staging.

I wish to be the first person on Mars

Granted. You are the first colonist on Mars, meaning you can't come back.

I wish to see Saturn and its magnificent rings, as well as all of its glorious moons.

Granted you buy a 10,000$ telescope but go broke buying it. Enjoy the view!

i wish to live in a dark sky area away from light pollution

193508192023

Granted. You live far away from humanity and in the extremely far future so there a very, very, very few stars(near the end of the universe time wise)


I wish there to be a MMO version of KSP

Granted. Its so laggy you get 1 frame per year.

i wish to know the outcome

Granted, its covered in mold

i wish to see all youtubers stop shamelessly asking for likes and subscribes
